channel.title: CVE Feed for Mighty Plugins -- Mighty Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mighty Plugins -- Mighty Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-48049|2024-10-20T13:34:00.395Z -- mighty%20plugins -- mighty%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Mighty Plugins Mighty Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Mighty Builder: from n/a through 1.0.2.
